StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetStandardOfE.ec.venessForRSorAbove]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Recrui.ngOrgID integer, @BeginDate date.me AS
--- use decimals for # interviews rather than integers DECLARE @TC_INTERVIEWS AS DECIMAL(10, 2) DECLARE @AC_INTERVIEWS AS DECIMAL(10, 2) DECLARE @OT_INTERVIEWS AS DECIMAL(10, 2) DECLARE @HV_INTERVIEWS AS DECIMAL(10, 2) DECLARE @DC_INTERVIEWS AS DECIMAL(10, 2)
SET @TC_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(TC_INTERVIEWS) FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] WITH (NOLOCK), [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP].PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP].CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY].ORGANIZATION_ID AND [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY].ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate))
SET @AC_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(AC_INTERVIEWS) FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] WITH (NOLOCK), [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP].PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP].CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY].ORGANIZATION_ID AND [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY].ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate))
SET @OT_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(OT_INTERVIEWS) FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] WITH (NOLOCK), [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP].PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP].CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY].ORGANIZATION_ID AND [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY].ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate))
SET @HV_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(HV_INTERVIEWS) FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] WITH (NOLOCK), [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP].PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP].CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY].ORGANIZATION_ID AND [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY].ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate))
SET @DC_INTERVIEWS = (SELECT SUM(DC_INTERVIEWS) FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] WITH (NOLOCK), [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP].PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP].CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY].ORGANIZATION_ID AND [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY].ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate))
SELECT TCvalue = CASE WHEN @TC_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING(SUM(RA.TCS)/ @TC_INTERVIEWS) ELSE 0 END, OTvalue = CASE WHEN @OT_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING((SUM(RA.OTS) / @OT_INTERVIEWS)) ELSE 0 END, ACvalue = CASE WHEN @AC_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING((SUM(RA.ACS) / @AC_INTERVIEWS)) ELSE 0 END, HVvalue = CASE WHEN @HV_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING((SUM(RA.HVS) / @HV_INTERVIEWS)) ELSE 0 END, DCvalue = CASE WHEN @DC_INTERVIEWS > 0 THEN CEILING(SUM(RA.DCS)/ @DC_INTERVIEWS) ELSE 0 END FROM [dbo].[RSS_ACTIVITY] RA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM ON RA.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND RA.ACTIVITY_DATE BETWEEN DATEADD(m, -3, @BeginDate) AND DATEADD(d, -1, @BeginDate)
